solution_line_template: Kenny used {kenny_pieces} / {pieces_per_mushroom} = <<{kenny_pieces}/{pieces_per_mushroom}={kenny_mushrooms}>>{kenny_mushrooms} mushrooms on his pizza.
Karla used {karla_pieces} / {pieces_per_mushroom} = <<{karla_pieces}/{pieces_per_mushroom}={karla_mushrooms}>>{karla_mushrooms} mushrooms on her pizza.
There are {remaining_pieces} / {pieces_per_mushroom} = <<{remaining_pieces}/{pieces_per_mushroom}={remaining_mushrooms}>>{remaining_mushrooms} mushrooms left on the cutting board.
GiGi cut up {twins_mushrooms} + {remaining_mushrooms} = <<{twins_mushrooms}+{remaining_mushrooms}={total_mushrooms}>>{total_mushrooms} mushrooms at the beginning.
